name: multiverse
description: A furystack-based microservice and microfrontend collection
author: Gallay Lajos <gallay.lajos@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn build:common && yarn build:workers && yarn build:services && yarn build:frontends
scripts.start:watch: yarn build:common && yarn build:workers && yarn build:services && concurrently --kill-others "tsc -b --watch" "yarn workspace @worker/media-encoder start:watch" "yarn workspace @service/auth start:watch" "yarn workspace @service/diag start:watch" "yarn workspace @service/media start:watch"  "yarn workspace xpense-service start:watch" "yarn workspace @frontend/core start"
scripts.test:cypress: yarn workspace @service/auth seed && concurrently --kill-others "yarn start" "yarn cypress run" --success first
scripts.start: yarn build:common && yarn build:workers && yarn build:services && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @worker/media-encoder start" "yarn workspace @service/auth start" "yarn workspace @service/diag start" "yarn workspace @service/media start"  "yarn workspace xpense-service start" "yarn workspace @frontend/core start"
scripts.clean: rimraf services/**/dist frontends/**/dist frontends/**/bundle common/**/dist **/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.recreate-schemas: yarn workspace @common/models ts-json-schema-generator -p src/schemas/**/*.ts -e all -o src/json-schemas.json
scripts.dockerize: yarn docker:base && yarn docker:auth && yarn docker:diag
